options.name: Fledgling Combatant
options.description: You have trained with several types of melee weapons. Gain +1 skill with simple and complex melee weapons.

options.name: Action : Power Strike
options.description: You make a powerful attack against an enemy with a simple or complex melee weapon. You roll an additional dice for your attack, but do not benefit from any extra damage. Instead, do three times the primary damage of your weapon.

options.name: Action : Close the Gap
options.description: You move up to 2 units towards an enemy and then make an attack against them with a melee weapon.

options.name: Reaction : Reactive Strike
options.description: When an enemy moves within your melee range, make an attack against them.

options.name: Conditioning
options.description: Your dedication to weapon training has resulted in increased conditioning. You gain +1 skill with fitness and +2 health.

options.name: Parry
options.description: You have trained to block attacks with your weapons. You gain +1 skill with deflection.

options.name: Skilled Combatant
options.description: You have trained with several types of melee weapons. Gain +1 skill with simple and complex melee weapons.

options.name: Perfect Form
options.description: You ignore penalties for weapons with the 'heavy' property and gain +1 skill with coordination.

options.name: Critical Hits
options.description: When all of your dice hit when making an attack with a simple or complex ranged weapon, deal extra damage equal to your weapon damage.

options.name: Talented Combatant
options.description: Your relentless training has resulted in +1 talent with simple and complex melee weapons.
